author: Special Correspondent
text:
P. Anjappan (58) of Perumalpettai near here died after he fell down in the sea on Wednesday.

The incident occurred when he was attending to a fault of engine of a boat at Kodiakarai. He died at the medical college hospital in Tiruvarur after being referred from Vedaranyam Government Hospital, sources said.

Coastal Security Group police of Vedaranyam have filed a case and are investigating.
title: Fisherman drowns
